articles.description: Fukrey 3 box office collection day 10: Despite facing competition from Thank You For Coming and Mission Raniganj, the Pankaj Tripathi and Richa Chadha-starrer maintained steady growth at the box office and earned Rs 3.60 crore on Saturday.
